website_summaries.verdict: A cute pink rice cooker built with a lot of functionality and large enough for a family.
pros: Large capacity rice cooker that handles 6 cups of uncooked rice
Can stay on and keep your rice warm for days
cons: This is a heavy rice cooker weighing almost 11 pounds
The instructions that come with this unit can be hard to understand

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting rice, high quality bowl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooker and rice actually tastes different. This is my first Cuckoo and I have permanently switched from Zojirushi and Tiger. I was wary of the pink color but it has a masculine touch to it. The picture is representative of the color. This model does not have the voice announcer. Rice tastes great after 72 hours in 'keep warm' mode.
customer_reviews.author: getsomesleep

customer_reviews.title: Some say a rice maker is a rice maker.. not this
customer_reviews.text: There are many options is the rice cooking land, and this is the best I’ve had in the price range. Actually better than half 2-3x as much. This cooker keeps rice hot for 48-70h although you shouldn’t keep rice heated past 12h. It does all sorts of other things but I only got it for rice. It’s specific, glutinous/wheat/porridge etc and it also has a “turbo” cook and cooks rice in 10-20 minutes. Love this! It’s a Korean made device.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi716

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this steadily for two years now and it has been very excellent and reliable. Minor cons - high contrast marking would be better on the inner pot, and setting the timer is not intuitive. But i use it only for rice, tho it does do other things, and the rice always comes out perfect so that's what counts. Dec. 2018 Still going strong, and now i finally used the slow cook function and that too worked perfectly. Dec. 2019 Still good as new
customer_reviews.author: Test

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Folks, I have been using the old fashioned single button rice cookers my whole life. And not one of those measures up to this rice cooker. This appliance is superior in every way to a conventional rice cooker. Does a better job of cooking rice, does it faster, super easy clean up, will keep rice warm for 24 hours! Would go longer but geez, 24 hours is terrific! Really very satisfied with this purchase. Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Reamo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've had a tiger brand for a long time and it was definitely time for an upgrade. I'm not too sure about this brand, just read it and decided to go with something different. I have to say, I'm in love with it. I eat jasmine long grain and it cooks to perfection. Although it is a little different from what I use to have but overall it's a really good rice cooker. I did get confuse with the glutinous setting.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing results, over-hyped
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I expected to be in rice heaven, but honestly it does not seem any better than our 30 year old rice cooker (cheap). The directions are in maddenly poor English. The various ways to increase quality by cooking longer seemed to have little effect. Overall very disappointed. I'm starting to be suspicious of Amazon customer reviews.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Everything is so good except for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good choice for everyone looking for such kind. I am pretty happy with that so far and it’s perfectly working. But only one thing make me give it one less star is every time when it’s done cooking there is always a lot liquid spilling all over the place, the liquid container too small, so the spilled hot steamed starch water is all over the countertop, and what’s worse, when you open the lid to get the cooked rice, the steamed water gathered on the small ventilation window will be poured down onto countertop and make a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yu

customer_reviews.title: White rice, brown rice.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The rice always comes out just right. It's small so it doesn't take up too much space but it's big enough to make several servings at once. We usually get about 10 servings every time we make rice. It's a decent price (not expensive, not cheap) and so far have been very satisfied with it's performance. Perfect for our family of 3. We've used this to cook rice every 2-3 days for almost a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my family of 5. it's not huge, mind you as my mother's and Auntie's Tigers and I have bought three of these for me , my mom, my aunt and we just ALL love it. The texture of the rice is so hydrated, the inner port is just nice and thick and the non stick is just industrial strength it seems. This pink one is made in Korea, I have not tried the red one made in China.
customer_reviews.author: dogloverdoc

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful little rice cooker...moving down from a 10 cup Tiger unit to this cute guy made for more counter space, better tasting & textured 5 grain rice. the first pot was a joint effort, my wife prepared the mixture and set the type/style setting and asked me to plug it in and start the process. We both enjoyed excellent cooked rice and at a quantity that makes more sense.
customer_reviews.author: Yobo-yah

customer_reviews.title: Great for brown rice!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sanyo rice cooker for years, it was rated well when I bought it but we lost the steam vent seal so after much research we replaced it with this. This one cooks rice so. much. better!!! I had no idea what a difference the rice cooker could make. Brown rice cooks in about an hour, and it’s fluffy and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Ferrency

customer_reviews.title: Rice is too fluffy and dry, no quick mode
customer_reviews.text: I've used IF pressure cookers... all broke after 5yrs or so... so I bought this one to see if it rice tastes the same... I was wrong, rice was flying around and dry to the point I felt like eating warmed up Chinese left over rice... if you want sticky rice, get at least pressure cooker or IF pressure cooker. I returned this for Cuckoo rice cooker with quick mode (15mins). Thought about zozirushi, but it lacks many functions and quick mode
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have Bluetooth. It doesn't have 15 modes, but it also isn't 500. It makes consistently good rice and it is easy to clean. Sturdy lid, and the express cook makes nice rice in a pinch
customer_reviews.author: Nia Ball

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Makes dry and hard to chew rice.
customer_reviews.text: By far, this is the worst cooker ever. I purchased this on January 14 and it seemed like it's working for a few weeks but then afterward, it started to cook rice really dry and hard to chew and they do not stick to each other. I followed their manual for the water measurements and rice measurements but still, end product was same. I have used other products from cuckoo prior to this one so I know what properly functioning ones are like, definitely not this one. The rice cooker is small and I think their seal is not tight enough to make rice soft and easy chew. I would not recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Seungah

customer_reviews.title: The best rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to get a rice cooker. I thought it might be difficult to use. This is hands down the best rice cooker I've ever used. The rice comes out the same consistency every time no matter how much or how little I cook. Cleaning it is so simple. Just use a soapy soft dish cloth. I would suggest though that you wash your rice before cooking it. You should do that anyway whether in a rice cooker or on the stove top. Amazing product will repurchase if mine ever breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice Every Time
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Cuckoo rice cooker for a variety of different rice and it is perfect every time. Easy to use and easy to clean. Great value. The performance is as good, or better, than much higher priced rice cookers. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KittyKat

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't right to cook and keep warm. The rice taste is horrible even you eat it right away after cook and when you keep rice warm, the color turns to brown in couple hours later. IT'S A GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MISOOK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Korean parent approved!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my parents were coming into town. They told me that the price I paid on amazon was really good and that it goes for more at the Korean market and stores. They were impressed by the product and brand - would definitely buy again - looks great on the counter and doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C Crouther

customer_reviews.title: Yummmy rice!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally in the market for a small and simple rice cooker and ended up upgrading to this and am very glad I did. I’ve been making all kinds of rice and every time I’m blown away by how great it turns out. This cooks rice right every time and always brings out the rice’s best qualities eg nuttiness, chew or aroma. Very easy to use and clean. Definitely bulky to keep on the counter but it earns its space.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Remember that one Asian cup (gou/kan) is only 180 mL...
customer_reviews.text: The removable cooking bowl is easy to clean and the non-stick part does not flake off in the same manner as some of the Zoojirushi bowls of comparable size. I'm a little surprised that the gradation markings inside the bowl are not as precise when differentiating between regular white rice and brown rice. Here in Denver, the boiling temperature is slightly lower than at sea level, so we *must* add a bit more water, else the cooked rice is dryer/harder than expected. My sweet rice comes out perfect every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a smaller cuckoo for myself which I love. Bought this one for my mom as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller cuckoo for myself which I love. Bought this one for my mom as I saw it was a larger cuckoo for the same price as the smaller cuckoo. Works great, but it is for making larger portions of rice, so if you only want to cook a cup of rice this isn't the right size for you - the fill lines begin at 2 cups
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Arnoso

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Just got this rice cooker after our cheapo $30 dollar cooker kicked it and I'm honestly so upset I didn't buy this sooner. We eat rice nearly every day and this little beauty is a game changer. Keeps rice warm and moist for so long and all the parts have such nice solid construction. If rice is a big part of your diet you cannot go wrong with this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M Juett

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but not great. Maybe because I had the more expensive Cuckoos before, but it seems that the more expense ones ($250+) the rice comes out better and lasts longer without needing to tinker with all the heat settings. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Perfect Rice Every Time.
customer_reviews.text: I had a really cheaply made crappy rice cooker a long time ago that was disappointing. We cook a lot of rice, though, and it's just not the same on the stove, so I read a ton of reviews and decided to give this little Cuckoo a try. We LOVE it. So easy, keeps it warm, makes perfect rice every single time. I've made 3 different styles of rice in it so far & all came out perfect. The removable plate & steamer thing make it SO easy to clean too. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rice cooker!!! Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker!!! I've owned Tiger and other brands and they do not compare at all! I was so amazed at how fluffy and delicious the rice was!!! You only get this kind of rice if you steam it the old fashioned way... So when I saw how good the rice turned out...I was truly happy!!! I decided to order another Cuckoo rice cooker for my mom. I know she will be amazed as well! Cuckoo is the best rice cooker out there!!!! You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Very good It is easy to cook rice
customer_reviews.text: Very good It is easy to cook rice . Just push one button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Never had a Korean rice cooker before, but bought it because of the color. The pot is very sturdy and it is easy to clean. It keeps rice warm and fresh for at least 2 days. Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Menu display to small and didn't come with steam basket
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected and didn't come with steam basket. I thought it suppose too maybe I'm wrong. Looks cute and clean been using them 4 times and rice taste good. Only the menu display are to small even with my reading glasses still hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: yoce verhoeven

customer_reviews.title: Good Entry Level Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the rice cooker almost daily for last 3 years. It is easy to use and rice tastes pretty good but not as good as pressured rice cooker. Unfortunately the rice cooker started to not function as well about a month ago. Rice is no longer cooked evenly (some portion of the pot is slightly less cooked)
customer_reviews.author: Kieru

customer_reviews.title: Better than pressure cookers for cooking rice
customer_reviews.text: Other similar machines that are advertised as "pressure cookers" are more expensive and dry out rice. This machine works great for brown rice and it will keep the rice hot for days without drying it out. Works great for those, like me, who are lazy and just want to take out small amounts of hot cooked rice as needed. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha9

customer_reviews.title: Not in original box
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have. It's easy to use. We replaced it and bought some other brand that weren't as good so we bought another one of these. Love the product but the packaging that arrived wasn't in its original box coming from Amazon. It looks new just in a plain brown cardboard box. Luckily it wasn't bought as a gift and only for self use.
customer_reviews.author: lluu

customer_reviews.title: Korea doesn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best rice cooker I've ever used! It's so cute and it makes perfect rice! Also very easy to clean, just make sure to wash with a dish cloth or soft sponge. Very happy with the performance. We'll see how this lasts in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Xen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, the inner pot had an extremely strong chemical smell. I just assumed it would go away with washing and using, and it has not. The smell is still as strong. I don't know if this is dangerous or not.
customer_reviews.author: jung park

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm rice for a longer time
customer_reviews.text: It keeps rice warm and soft! Had cheap rice cooker but it will harden and turn the rice yellow. I could have bought a pressure rice cooker but price wise, it was a great option. If u have other pressure cooker like instant pot, this is ur rice cooker ! Best rice cooker maker from Korea!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker ever!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to buy one of these types of rice cookers but there were so many brands to choose from. After doing my research I decided to purchase this one and I am so glad. So easy to cook rice and it is perfect all the time. My husband forgot to turn off the warmer so 24 hours later the rice was warm and still fresh - no burnt bottom and still very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: 808Posh

customer_reviews.title: Steam bucket could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: Cooks the rice but periodically the moisture holder falls off and I have water steam on my counter. Just from a simple shutting of top.
customer_reviews.author: PA XIONG

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker out there!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is the far best one I've owned! I can keep my rice warm for a few days without the rice turning yellow or smell or get watery! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! Keeps rice warm for days 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Nice little rice cooker. I retired my 10 cup zojirushi rice cooker and got this and been loving it. Works great and doesn’t take that much space, the color is really cute too even though I prefer neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used a cuckoo cooker for more than 10 years without any trouble in Korea. I trust cuckoo.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: She said it was easy and fun different favors the rice cooker it better than the old one. Never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nou Vue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A must need kitchen product for everyday rice cookers. Everyone in my family has one version of this. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Rice came out perfect and just the right size for my family of four. I normally cook four cups only. I love the color and the shape too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I waited so long to buy one! I just wish there were instructions for jasmine rice. We had to play around a few times and found that steaming 4 cups of jasmine rice for 30 minutes makes the rice perfect. It’s not hard or mushy from too much water/over cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Shing Her

customer_reviews.title: Love cuckoo brand
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping better than expected definitely recommend the rice cooker
customer_reviews.author: dariimaa

customer_reviews.title: Cooks the same as $30 rice cookers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. You can get the same quality of cooked rice using other brands, which cost just one third or one forth of this rice cooker
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rice cooker, my mom and I both have the same one. She has had hers for at least 5 years and I just bought mine last year. Rice cooks perfectly and deliciously.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: works great and super easy to clean. taking off a star for the weird smell it has when washing the rice bowl
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I used 4 times and the computer part was not working to cook the rice. I returned and received $95 refund when I paid $129. It's easy to clean and easy to use. Takes 2 hours to cook brown rice. It's ashame that it stopped working. It was pretty one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the one I had ( pot was chipping) so I got this one
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: cute & useful
customer_reviews.text: Just wish there were recipes, and more instructions in English.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: We just bought bought this rice cooker but we love it already
customer_reviews.text: We just bought bought this rice cooker but we love it already. It kept our rice on the warm setting for 2 days without it going bad. The rice was actually still good in day 3. Our ols rice cooker the rice would go bad in less than 1/2 a day. We are so happy we purchased it. The manual is in English and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I was debating back and forth with this and a Japanese rice cooker. I’m so happy I got this. It’s looks great and the rice is so amazing. Must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Went from $700 rice cooker to this one
customer_reviews.text: And we love this one! It’s not complicated. It’s easy to clean and it’s not loud! Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice every time.....only thing it is one trick pony. It is a rice cooker....I would not use for any other cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Best rice I’ve ever made at home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Easy to use. Takes about 45-50 mins for rice to be ready. We use every week. And if you leave it on warm over night by accident the rice still tastes great the next morning (mom fail but hey it was still delicious 😉)
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Best economical choice
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Kurokawa

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Bought item as a gift and she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker. It's godd size for two or three person that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: HGA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice/Convenient Warm Setting
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect rice! I did have to look up some of the directions for buttons on YouTube as I can’t read Korean, but not a big deal. My family members all want one of these now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my parents home and its a good size for two
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Bought this for my parents home and its a good size for two. I think a family of 4 can be doable too.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! Use it daily. Keeps rice fresh next day. Easy to clean and use. Rice perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker makes the delicious pots of rice. It's well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON CRIBBs

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my bf’s birthday. He loved it. The cooker makes delicious rice within a short period of time. I’m happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mluong

customer_reviews.title: Running amazing after a year or two
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't let us down. Running amazing after a year or two. Runs very well for anyone that also likes to have rice waiting for \daily\ use.
customer_reviews.author: Shii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice everytime
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice everytime. Nice size for my wife and i. We usually easy from it twice before it's gone. Seems to Keeps rice good and ready to eat for about a week
customer_reviews.author: turtleturtle

customer_reviews.title: Rice turns out way better than our old rice cooker and seems to last ...
customer_reviews.text: Rice turns out way better than our old rice cooker and seems to last longer. Our old rice cooker the rice would turn mushy and hard after 2 or 3 days. And my wife and 3 daughters think it’s cute. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my family and i love the turbo cook option. It's also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mai doua

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 cups
customer_reviews.text: I just cook only 2 cups, if 3 cups rice is not well
customer_reviews.author: Thuan T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: will not cook
customer_reviews.text: Does not cook the rice it is very water, I think the timer has gone out.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My boyfriend loves it as well. Rice is cooked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L L

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and rice and quinoa comes out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: olesya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do; nothing fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy awesome rice cooker. As a regular rice eating family, it’s helpful to always have rice on hand and this cooker keeps rice warm for at least 2 days without crusting or browning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy N.

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you are big rice eater!!!
customer_reviews.text: It just does great job and, at the same time it is so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Yoonhee Choi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to understand how to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Pang Z. Sandy Lee

customer_reviews.title: simple and better
customer_reviews.text: Used for a few months now. Much better than the instapot and is cheaper than a top of the line Cuckoo.
customer_reviews.author: J. Han

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ricer
customer_reviews.text: Man, does this make great rice! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: super yummy rice
customer_reviews.text: this is a great asset to any kitchen and any household size
customer_reviews.author: pablo moyano

customer_reviews.title: Hair in my brand new rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed the rice cooker and there was a long strand of human hair on it. Disgusted and grossed out. Whoever assembled it got their hair stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: rob lenois

customer_reviews.title: I can finally make good rice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Haven't messed up rice once since I got it! Only downside is most of the instructions are in Korean, even instructions I guess would be good to know. But I looked up Cuckoo on YouTube and they had a handy tutorial that helped me out.
customer_reviews.author: theprairiekid

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the steam & crock pot options. Great size for 2 people...but also adequate servings for 8.
customer_reviews.author: MD Chase

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rice every time! I bought it a couple months ago and I’m still impressed. Good quality design too. I should’ve went with a bigger size though with 6 people in my house
customer_reviews.author: Gate

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It keeps rice fresh for about 2-3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It keeps rice fresh for about 2-3 days. (Rice doesn't get dry or go bad with 'keep warm' function) Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grood rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. I keep rice in keep warm for over 24 hours and the rice is still fresh and firm. Does not change color or make rice brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... using it for 3 years and it still works great. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 3 years and it still works great. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Moanaro B.

customer_reviews.title: and very quick cooking - the turbo cook feature is great. Cuckoo is a great brand
customer_reviews.text: Compact, nice/clean design, and very quick cooking - the turbo cook feature is great. Cuckoo is a great brand, so far, the little rice cooker has never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: I satisfy this product. Easy to use and best qualiry!
customer_reviews.author: Don Jeong

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret buying this !
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and efficient ! I get perfectly cooked rice every time. I also love how easy to use it is!
customer_reviews.author: Greisly N

customer_reviews.title: ... given this product 5 stars had the instructions been better.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars had the instructions been better.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Jones

customer_reviews.title: GOOD~
customer_reviews.text: It is very good for korean and resonable price for me. If somebody hesitate to buy it, i definitely recommand it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunmuk Lim

customer_reviews.title: It Swings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rice cooker to make the process of cooking rice simpler. I do not like having to wait around my kitchen for 45 minutes while I keep an eye on my rice, and then have to guesstimate when I think all of the water has been evaporated and the rice is finished. Now I just throw in some rice, add the water and turn it on. Keeps the rice warm for days too. The nonstick pot is extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sljuka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Try several items but this is the one If you want just rice cook This is it.
customer_reviews.author: hosang Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: It is very wonderful. Quickly and nicley I can eat rice with the ease of use. It is essential for rice . .
customer_reviews.author: Whitea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, cooks brown rice to a perfection. You can reheat your rice anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle444

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. I prefer cuckoo over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Good to small family
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to small family or single. small-sized but enough. Automatically done without many efforts by using timer. Cooking noise is not serious.
customer_reviews.author: Jongeon Park

customer_reviews.title: This is best
customer_reviews.text: These rice cookers are the best. The rice is always perfect. It also has a warm feature. I would not get any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Pam Langley

customer_reviews.title: Cute rice maker
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my Korean daughter-in-law as a housewarming gift when they moved. Her mom in Korea has one like it and she had it on her wish list. She was thrilled to get it and I was happy to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product well worth the price and features that are often only found the more expensive models. I would've given five stars but the only color it was offered in was white and pink
customer_reviews.author: K. Arn

product_meta.title: Cuckoo CR-0631F 6-cup Multifunctional Micom Rice Cooker & Warmer – 9 built-in programs, White/GABA, Mixed/Brown, Porridge, Steam, Slow-Cook, and My Mode [16 flavors and textures], White/Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkTelfon Coating (inner Pot) Feeds up to 6 people Turbo Cooking Functions Can cook GABA rice and brown rice Made in Korea
feature_bullets: Essential: Prepare perfect GABA, mixed rice, porridge, and more. LCD display with 10 menu options including, Multi Cook, Multigrain, Steam, etc. My Mode a customized function you select the degree of softness, glutinosity and tastiness you desire.

Faster, Smarter Cooking: Features Fuzzy Logic and Intelligent Cooking Algorithm, detect grain type, temperature and cook time! Dishes are ready in no time with energy-saving faster cooking times. Adjustable Keep Warm Temperatures and Reheating options.

Professional Quality: Premium inner bowl brings optimal temperature and heat distribution throughout your food and designed for durability, strength, and longevity. Easy one-touch cover lid release button and drain dish allow for easy cleanup.

Safety First: We went the extra mile to ensure our electric rice cooker is as safe as it is easy to use! With automatic steam and pressure emission, a lid locking device, auto temperature control, we’re putting your safety first.

Trusted Brand: With 40 years of experience Cuckoo has perfected the art of cooking rice. Join the Cuckoo community and enjoy your perfectly cooked rice, prepared in no time in your streamlined, stylish rice cooker that will compliment any kitchen.
